welcome.title: Welcome to Starlit Journals!
welcome.content: Welcome to Starlit Journals! We're glad you're here. Start writing and enjoy your journey.

seasonal.title: Happy Valentine's Day!
seasonal.content: Wishing you a day filled with love and kindness. Take a moment to write something for yourself or someone you care about.

feedback.title: Help Us Improve (50 coins reward)
feedback.content: It's your 3rd day! Please help us learn and improve by filling out this quick feedback form: https://tally.so/r/3xoNOo. As a thank you, you'll receive 50 coins!

reward.title: Your Welcome Gift
reward.content: We've added 50 coins to your account as a welcome gift. Enjoy journaling!

7day.title: 7-Day Streak!
7day.content: You've journaled for 7 days. Here's 50 coins!

30day.title: 30-Day Streak!
30day.content: 30 days of journaling! 150 coins for you.

365day.title: 1 Year Streak!
365day.content: A year of journaling. 1000 coins and a special theme!

10entries.title: 10 Entries!
10entries.content: You've written 10 entries. 25 coins for you!

365entries.title: 365 Entries!
365entries.content: A year's worth of entries! 750 coins and a badge.

weeklySummary.title: Your Weekly Summary
weeklySummary.content: This week: {entryCount} entries, {publicCount} public, {privateCount} private. Most frequent mood: {mostFrequentMood}. Keep writing!

prompt.title: Writing Prompt
prompt.content: Write about a small moment that made you smile recently.

prompt.title: Writing Prompt
prompt.content: Describe a place where you feel most at peace.

prompt.title: Writing Prompt
prompt.content: What is something you're looking forward to?
